description.brief: ROCK driver library for the BD970 GNSS receiver from Tribmle Ltd.

package.description: This driver provides the interface for using the Tribmle bd90 receiver. The driver reads data sent by a GNSS receiver using NMEA protocol.
package.author: Vassilios Tsounis/vastsoun@gmail.com
Javier Hidalgo Carrio/havyhidalgo@gmail.com
